original_text: So I will cause you to be very ashamed, like a woman whose dress they have removed. So I will cause you to be very ashamed, like a woman whose dress they have removed. So I will cause you to be very ashamed, like a woman whose dress they have removed. So I will cause you to be very ashamed,
korean_text: 그러므로 내가 네 치마를 네 얼굴에까지 들춰서 네 수치를 드러내리라

sentences.original_text: So I will cause you to be very ashamed
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 내가 너희를 매우 부끄럽게 하겠다
